featureValue_molex.desc: Uninflected form (adjectives in molex, not in corpus tagset)

feature.desc: Mood (subjunctives and imperatives are not in the molex database)
feature.name: mood

feature.desc: Position (for Dutch verbs in the second person singular present, inflection depends on position before or after subject)
feature.name: position

featureValue_molex.desc: After subject (normal SV[O] order, 'je loopt'); molex only
Before subject, in questions, object-first sentences, or sentences starting with an adverbial clause ('loop je?', 'Dat zie je', 'Daarom loop je'); molex only

feature.desc: Subtype (only for numerals in Molex, now also for PD, ADV and CONJ)
feature.name: subtype

featureValue.desc: Pronominal adverb dropping the pronominal part
Qualitative conjunction 'als' in the sense 'in the quality of'
Meta, de SPEC(meta) van het CGN
Reciprocal or reflexive. Category in corpus gysseling, where e.g. 'zich' can be used in the reciprocal sense.

featureValue_molex.desc: 'Converted' Adjective, present participle; Molex feature only
'Converted' Adjective, past participle; Molex feature only

implications.declaration: pos=PD, type=poss => LN, LP, number, gender
